code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function People(){const[people,setPeople]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/seqamlab/data/people.json").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setPeople(data));},[]);const current=people.filter(p=>p.status!=="past");const past=people.filter(p=>p.status==="past");const renderPerson=person=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border rounded p-4 shadow bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:person.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:person.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm mt-1",children:person.research_interests}),person.profile_link&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:person.profile_link,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"text-blue-600 text-sm mt-2 inline-block",children:"Profile"})]},person.name);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8 space-y-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-[#cc0033]",children:"Lab Members"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:current.map(renderPerson)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mt-10 mb-4 text-gray-800",children:"Former Lab Members"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:past.map(renderPerson)})]})]});}
